item.title: Spring puzzler: transactional @PostConstruct methods
Introduction to declarative transaction management in Spring Framework
item.description: Introduction In this blog post we are going to explore the internals of Spring’s declarative transaction management. We’ll start with the basics, and then we’ll dive deeper, looking at the internals and some potential pitfalls which we can run into. We’ll be using: Spring Boot 2.6.7 Java 17 Postgresql Spring Data JPA But first, let’s discuss a bit why do we even bother with transactions in the first place?
